bookinfo.title: DocBook Tag Usage Guide
bookinfo.subtitle: Recommended practices for using DocBook XML tags in technical documentation.

abstract.para: This book describes some recommended DocBook XML tags to use in technical documentation. It is a work in progress, currently far from complete or definitive, and needs considerable help. It originated as a guide to help Red Hat authors choose the most appropriate tags in any given situation, and to apply them consistently. Consequently, you will find frequent references to Red Hat documentation.
